All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AckPing
ack response sent by the server to the client
BoardPlayer
BoardPlayer class manages the scene of the game, along with the shelf, the chat, the board, all the goal cards and the shelves of the other players.
CG_Groups
CG_Groups is a class that extends CommonGoalCard and represents the card of type Groups.
CG_RowCol
CG_RowCol is a class that extends CommonGoalCard and represents the card of type rows or column.
CG_Shape
 
CGC0Test
test to check the correct behaviour of CGC0 with all the possible scenarios
CGC10Test
test to check the correct behaviour of CGC10 with all the possible scenarios

test to check the correct behaviour of CGC11 with all the possible scenarios

test to check the correct behaviour of CGC7 with all the possible scenarios
CGC8Test
test to check the correct behaviour of CGC8 with all the possible scenarios
CGC9Test
test to check the correct behaviour of CGC9 with all the possible scenarios
ChatMessage
chat message sent to the client via server
ChatMessageRequest
chat message sent from the client
ChooseTilesRequest
request from the client to choose tiles from the board.
ClientController
the ClientController class manages the client: it re-directs requests between the view, the responseDecoder, the commandParsing and the network.
ClientExecutable
 
ClientGUI
class ClientGUI for the graphical interface of the game
ClientListenerGUI
this class is used by the server to communicate with the client via RMI (it's used so that the server can invoke these methods, which then invoke the client's view methods)
ClientListenerTUI
this class is used by the server to communicate with the client via RMI (it's used so that the server can invoke these methods, which then invoke the client's view methods)
ClientRMI
ClientRMI class used to manage the RMI connection to the server.
ClientSocket
ClientSocket class used to manage the Socket connection to the server.
ClientTUI
class ClientTUI for the textual interface of the game
ColumnOk
response after the choice of a column
ColumnRequest
request from a client to choose a column to place the tiles in.
CommandParsing
CommandParsing class is used to parse the user's input
CommonGoalCard
 
CommonGoalCardTest
 
CommonGoalGained
notification from the server about a player winning a common goal card.
ConnectionAckTimer
this is used to check whether a player has sent an ack.
ConnectionClientTimer
this is the timer client-side to check whether the client received the syn/ping by the server.
ConnectionManager
ConnectionManager is an instance used to keep track of the players, their status (inactive or active) and their listeners (which are made to be reachable from the server so that the server can contact the users).
ConnectionPlayer
ConnectionPlayer class is the controller of the scene of the connection and login of the player
Couple
 
CTimer
 
Deck
 
DeckTest
 
DisconnectionNotif
notification from the server about the disconnection of a user
DrawTui
 
EndGame
EndGame class is the controller for the scene of the end of the game containing the scoreboard with the results
EndTurn
notification of the server about the end of a player's turn
ErrorMessage
ErrorMessage class is used to create a pop-up message to show an error
Game
 
GameController
 
GameControllerTest
 
GameEnd
notification from the server about the end of a match
GameStart
notification from the server about the start of a new match
GameTest
 
GameView
 
GenericController
abstract class GenericController used to implement a simil-controller for the GUI to move from one scene to another
GoalCard
 
GUIApplication
 
IClientConnection
connection interface which is implemented by ClientRMI and ClientSocket
IClientListener
this interface's methods are called mainly by the server to communicate with the client via RMI (using ClientListenerGUI and ClientListenerTUI) or via Socket (using ServerSocketClientHandler)
IRemoteController
this is our RMI registry
LastTurn
notification from the server about the beginning of the last turn after someone completed their shelf
LivingRoom
 
LivingRoomTest
 
LivingRoomView
 
LoginRequest
request from a client to log in
LoginResponse
response after a login request
ModelUpdate
 
ModelUpdateNotification
notification from the server about the update of the model
MultiServerSocket
this is the main class of the server socket, which only instantiates the ServerSocket, executes accepts() method and creates thread to handle multiple accepted connections
NotifyOnTurn
notification from the server about the start of a new turn

Player
 
PlayerView
 
Position
 
QuitRequest
request from the client to quit the game
RearrangeOk
response about the re-arrange of the tiles chosen
RearrangeTilesRequest
request from the client to re-arrange the tiles chosen
Request
Abstract class Request defines the common methods and attributes of all the requests.
Response
generic response interface implemented by specific responses classes
ResponseDecoder
this class is used to decode and handle the messages incoming from the server (only for Socket purposes)
ResponseHandler
interface to let the client handle the different kinds of responses
SceneNames
 
ServerExecutable
 
ServerManager
 
ServerSocketClientHandler
this class handles the communication with the client associated to the assigned socket.
ServerSynTimer
this class is used to send the ping/syn to the client
Shelf
 
ShelfView
 
State
 
StaticStrings
 
SynPing
Ping message sent to the client periodically
T_Type
 
TextNotification
used by the server to send a generic text notification.
